title: Pretty
text: I love these hair bands, the plain ones are particularly very nice material. I wear a different one every day and I get compliments.

title: For a beginner-
text: The drill would not hold in place and after 4 days it stop working

title: So far so good!
text: This is a nice thick cream. The fragrance is pleasant. It goes on smoothly, not tacky. I use it at night before bed. I have dry psoriasis patches near my ears and this Ceramide Complex does not burn or irritated that skin. It takes time and several uses for this type of product to see a real effect. I'm planning on continued usage to see how it goes. I have no complaints so far and I'm hoping for a good outcome weeks from now.

title: Nice Inexpensive wig
text: This wig is nice and lightweight. The hair is soft so far but it has only been worn once so that's not a real indication of how good it will hold up.  Of course, it's a hard front, not lace front so it needs some adjustments to make it look natural. The part isn't natural looking but you could tweeze/pluck it to make it look natural. Overall, with all things considered, it serves its purpose.

title: Does the Job Well
text: It does the job, but remember not to unwrap all of the plastic off cake of pesticide.  I just remove about one-fourth at a time, as it evaporates into my closets.  Otherwise, the pleasant cedar smell can be overwhelming.

title: Good Value
text: For the amount of nails you get, the price is great. I have used artificial nails for years and these are just as good as the more expensive brands. I'm not a big fan of the coffin shape and was easily able to file them into the shape I prefer. They are definitely a matte finish, so if you don't like that, you won't like these. The color is exactly as pictured.

title: Cute but leaks after a month
text: At first I gave it 5 stars, but as well it started leaking after a month and I don’t know why. I don’t have it too stuffed and the door is never opened unless I open it to get my cream. Not sure how to get rid of the leak.

title: Shark Fin Durag... :)
text: Good color, but i would say the stitching and the way this is sewn is unsatisfactory. Not trying to look like a T-Rex with this durag on or a shark out of water. Look like a giant fin at the top of this durag. The original product photo don't show this seam looking so pronounced. Durags ate also worn for fashion, so people who make durags should be a little more tasteful with the sewing and threading job. I think this is a good durag. Not great though in terms of visual affect. Could've been better.

title: Wonderful lip balm but smells different
text:
I bought this lip balm because I'm absolutely head over heels for the scent of the Bum Bum Cream (in addition to the cream I also have the shower gel and the body spray..that's how obsessed with it I am) but I was disappointed to find that this doesn't smell the same. It smells really good, it's just missing a few notes that the other products have. It mostly smells like vanilla with maybe a slight hint of caramel.
It's very moisturizing, I love how it feels on my lips, and overall it is a high quality lip balm that's worth it's price tag. However, if you're hoping it's going to smell like the cream, you're going to be disappointed. This is the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars.

title: Very difficult to apply
text: I did not like this lotion. It is very hard to apply and seems to stay on the top of the skin, leaving a white film.  I had it on for several hours, it never soaked in and the white film never went away. I purchased it to save the reefs but would not use it otherwise.

title: has bubbles in the metallic sheet around the edges and it fogs up pretty quickly.
text: Mirror slides down the shower curtain, has bubbles in the metallic sheet around the edges and it fogs up pretty quickly.

title: Cheep product
text: After couple of usage, the magnetic goes of, this product looks cheep.
